column.name: created_by_id
column.valueComputed: fac_assessment.created_by FROM fac_assessment WHERE fac_assessment.id = assessment_id

column.name: last_modified_by
column.valueComputed: fac_assessment.created_by FROM fac_assessment WHERE fac_assessment.id = assessment_id

changeSet.author: Ali Sedaghat
changeSet.sql: alter table fak_assessment_kit rename constraint baseinfo_assessmentprofile_pkey to pk_fak_assessment_kit;

column.name: created_by
column.valueComputed: baseinfo_expertgroup.owner_id FROM baseinfo_expertgroup WHERE fak_assessment_kit.expert_group_id = baseinfo_expertgroup.id

column.name: last_modified_by
column.valueComputed: baseinfo_expertgroup.owner_id FROM baseinfo_expertgroup WHERE fak_assessment_kit.expert_group_id = baseinfo_expertgroup.id

column.name: created_by

column.name: last_modified_by

changeSet.author: Ali Sedaghat

column.name: created_by

column.name: created_by

changeSet.author: Ali Sedaghat
changeSet.sql: alter table fak_answer_option rename constraint baseinfo_answertemplate_pkey to pk_fak_answer_option;

changeSet.author: Ali Sedaghat
changeSet.sql: alter table fak_answer_option drop constraint if exists baseinfo_answertemplate_value_check;

changeSet.author: Ali Sedaghat
changeSet.sql: alter table fak_answer_option drop constraint if exists baseinfo_answertemplate_index_check;

column.name: creation_time
column.valueComputed: baseinfo_question.creation_time FROM baseinfo_question WHERE fak_answer_option.question_id = baseinfo_question.id

column.name: last_modification_time
column.valueComputed: baseinfo_question.last_modification_date FROM baseinfo_question WHERE fak_answer_option.question_id = baseinfo_question.id

column.name: created_by
column.valueComputed: fak_questionnaire.created_by FROM fak_questionnaire WHERE fak_questionnaire.id = (SELECT baseinfo_question.questionnaire_id FROM baseinfo_question WHERE fak_answer_option.question_id = baseinfo_question.id)

column.name: last_modified_by
column.valueComputed: fak_questionnaire.last_modified_by FROM fak_questionnaire WHERE fak_questionnaire.id = (SELECT baseinfo_question.questionnaire_id FROM baseinfo_question WHERE fak_answer_option.question_id = baseinfo_question.id)
